author: ceki
msg: Corrected the hideous error on the chainsaw page where most of the page would
be shown as if it were a URL link.
This is due to a bug whereby velocity shortens elements with an empty body.
For example, the anchor was tranformed into .
This confuses most browsers and even kills IE.

author: sdeboy
msg: Attempting to prevent an exception during layout of detail pane.

author: sdeboy
msg: Prevent layout exceptions when trying to set the caret position on a detail pane with an empty string.
